summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of McKinley Place from Kirkwood Place to Meridian Avenue; Woodlawn Avenue from Kirkwood Place to North 63rd Street; Meridian Avenue, from Kirkwood Place to Woodlawn Avenue; North 63rd Street from East Green Lake Boulevard to Woodlawn Avenue; Kensington Place from North 60th Street to Ladd Street; North and East 59th Street, from Kirkwood Place to Latona Avenue; North 61st Street, from Meridian Avenue to Corliss Avenue, Corliss Avenue from North 59th Street to North 63rd Street; Ladd Street, from Kirkwood Place to Kensington Place, and East 56th Street from Kensington Place to Latona Avenue; all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon. all in accordance with Resolution No. 1174 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
